hackathon-description-text: nwHacks is the biggest 24 hours hackathon in western Canada hosted at University of British Columbia. Hackathon aims to bring together the brightest talents from schools around the Pacific Northwest region. Get ready for a weekend of learing and discoveries!
hackathon-rules:
Please refer to MLH's code of conduct
http://static.mlh.io/docs/mlh-code-of-conduct.pdf

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: - 1st Place: Dell Tablets for each team member
Hacks will be judged based on: Implementation, Ease of use, and Uniqueness of idea.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: PIA: Best Privacy, Security or Crypto Hack
Orbis: Solving or Improving a Social Problem Using Data Analytics
CA Technologies: Best IoT App with Mobile Interface

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: HP Pro Tablets for each team member
1 year of Wolfram Development Platform (Developer Level)

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: MLH: Best Domain Name from Domain.com

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1TB hard drives for each team member

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Fred Kaiser Bldg, 2332 Main Mall, Vancouver, BC V6T 1Z4, Canada

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is the hack technically interesting or difficult? Is it just some lipstick on an API, or were there real technical challenges to surmount?
Is the project unique and creative? When someone sees the project, will they think "WOW this is cool" ?
Is the hack usable in its current state? Is the user experience smooth? Does everything appear to work? Is it well-designed?

hackathon-location-address: Fred Kaiser Bldg, 2332 Main Mall, Vancouver, BC V6T 1Z4, Canada
